Hi,
I am Yadong Zhang
Member of QINREN Team

I'm a research student from Xi'an Jiao Tong University. Machine learning and artificial intelligence are my favorite research fields. Welcome to my webpage : )

Resume

Major Work

I am passionate about the machine learning and its applications. Thanks to XIN and my parterner! My major works are as follows:

Machine Learning Algorithm

Based on the tensorflow and keras, I dig into the machine learning algorithm of time series prediction with LSTM and other related methods. I compare the performance of them and invent more interesting structures for better and efficient forecasting.

Stock Price Prediction

Stock market is non-linear, dynamic and complicated system. I manage to use the previous informations of certain stock price to predict a credible future trend. I am still working for this to reach much better performance and help investors to make more reliable decisions.

Battery State of Charge Estimation

Aiming at establishing the accurate and adaptive model to estimate the state of charge and health of Li-ion battery, we use the multivariate time series prediction model to map the relationship between voltage, current, temperature and battery state of charge.

Brief Introduction to the Work Progress

In the left diagram, the MLA, STOCK and SOC refer to the machine learning algorithm, stock price prediction and state of charge estimation.

Research Details

Project Details

The details and results will be shown here.

Machine Learning Algorithm

80%

“Keywords: Time series prediction, LSTM, RNN"

  • Invent a new structure of multiscale RNN
  • Compare the performance of the new method with LSTM and others
  • Test with different kind of toy data
  • Good performance in the time series forcasting

Stock Market Price Prediction

75%

“Keywords: Time series prediction model, Trend prediction, Sentiment"

  • Develop the stock price prediction model to track the trend of market
  • Consider multivariate related informations
  • Good accuracy

Battery State of Charge Estimation

50%

“Keywords: Multivariate time series prediction, State of charge, Simulink"

  • Build the SOC estimation model based on machine learning algorithm
  • Collect battery running simulation data in different circumstance
  • Consider voltage, current, temparature and so on
